div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 723 Thasos:, 1953 Burial: 340-335 B.C. Contents: 71 AR, 63 AE. Pot hoard from excavations Thasos: 12 dr.; 2 triob.; 63 AE, Byzantium: 3 dr.; 35 triob. Calchedon: 7 dr.; 12 triob. Disposition: Cavalla Le Rider, BCH 1956, p. 1-19, illus.
